Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory27.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Why are you still following me? Do you need a tour guide or something?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'That would be great!', 3: '6', 4: "If that's possible.", 5: '7'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Can't you take a hint...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...Fine. But no funny business, I warn you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Oasis is where we reside in this wild desert.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'There might not be a lot of facilities here...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'But it has supported our aspiration to live.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'So, whoever dares to violate this place...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "...They'll have their *** handed to them, do you understand?", 4: '1'}
{2: "That's the spirit!", 3: '14', 4: 'Do you need a hand?', 5: '15'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Obviously.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Do you think I'll ask you for it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'God, it makes my blood boil mentioning those invaders.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I should stop talking about it and just show you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "But don't let anyone know you're from up there. I won't be able to help you with what comes next.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Aren't you their leader?", 3: '20', 4: "Even when you're their leader?", 5: '20'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You're right that I'm their leader. So what do you think will happen...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...If they find me with a Babylonian?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You're a commandant, are you not? I'm sure you can at least understand that.", 4: '1'}
